fields.name: Keramzit 0-5
fields.description:
Kengaytirilgan loy-bu yog'och va beton pollarni, shiftlarni, devorlarni, pollarni, tomlarni va chodirlarni izolyatsiya qilish uchun ishlatiladigan yuqori samarali izolyatsiya. Yuqori issiqlik izolyatsiyasi xususiyatlari tufayli kengaytirilgan loy nafaqat uyni izolyatsiyalashda, balki hammom qurilishida yoki poydevor qo'yishda ham keng ommalashdi.
Noyob tuzilish bir qator foydali fazilatlarni ta'minlaydi:
‚úîkuch. 
‚úîjuda past issiqlik o'tkazuvchanligi.
‚úîovoz yalƒ±tƒ±mƒ± (g√∂zenekli tuzilish tufayli erishiladi).
‚úîolovga chidamli.
‚úîsovuqqa chidamlilik. 
‚úîyengilligi. 
‚úîÔ∏è Atmosfera barqarorligi.
‚úîÔ∏è Chirish va parchalanishga moyil emas.
‚úîÔ∏è Kimyoviy jihatdan inert.
‚úîÔ∏è Bardoshli.
‚úîÔ∏è Ekologik toza.

fields.description_en:
Expanded clay is a highly effective insulation that is used to insulate wooden and concrete floors, ceilings, walls, interstory floors, roofs and attics. Due to its high thermal insulation properties, expanded clay has gained wide popularity not only in home insulation, but also in bath construction or in laying the foundation.
The unique structure provides a number of useful qualities:
‚úîDurability. 
‚úîVery low thermal conductivity.
‚úîsound insulation (achieved due to the porous structure).
‚úîFire resistance.
‚úîFrost resistance. 
‚úîLightness. 
‚úîÔ∏è Atmospheric resistance.
‚úîÔ∏è Is not subject to rotting and decomposition.
‚úîÔ∏è Chemically inert.
‚úîÔ∏è Durable.
‚úîÔ∏è Environmentally friendly.                                        
We offer you to get acquainted with the assortment:                                                     üü† 0-5 fraction
üü†5-20 fraction   
 üü†20-40 fraction  
 _________________
üìû  912535308

fields.name: Komovaya oxak
fields.description: Komovaya ohak. To'plangan ohak boshqa turdagi ohak ishlab chiqarish uchun oraliq mahsulotdir. Biz uni pechlarda qilamiz. Faoliyat-Cao+Mgo > 90%
fields.description_en: Quicklime (komovaya) lime. Lump lime is a semi-product for the production of other types of lime. We make it in furnaces.  Activity- CaO+Mgo>90%

fields.name: Gidratlangan  1-katta yugurishdagi nav
fields.description: Gidratlangan ohak (paxmoq). Shiqillagan ohakni suv bilan qayta ishlashda uning s√∂nd√ºr√ºlmesi sodir bo'ladi, buning natijasida u kukunga aylanadi. Ushbu jarayon reaktsiya orqali sodir bo'ladi: Cao + H2O ‚Üí Ca(oh) 2, faoliyat-Cao+MgO \ u003e 68%
fields.description_en: Hydrated lime (pushonka).  When processing lump lime with water, it is quenched, as a result of which it disintegrates into powder. This process proceeds by reaction:                                    CaO + H2O ‚Üí Ca(OH)2, Activity- CaO+MgO>68%

fields.name: Ohak maydalangan 1-nav.
fields.name_en: Hydrate crushed quicklime grade 1 in big bags.
fields.description: Ezilgan ohak. Biz maydalangan ohakni tegirmonlarda to'plangan ohakni o'ziga xos yuzasiga 3500-5000 sm2/g gacha maydalash orqali olamiz. faoliyat - Cao+Mgo \ U003e 85%
fields.description_en: Crushed quicklime. Ground quicklime is obtained by grinding lump lime in mills to a specific surface area of 3500-5000 cm2/ g. Activity- CaO+Mgo>85%

fields.name: Qurilish Navoiy
fields.description: Lore Ipsum shunchaki bosma va matn terish sanoatining qo'g'irchoq matnidir. Lore Ipsum 1500S beri hech sanoat standart model matn bo'ldi, noma'lum printer turdagi bir oshxona oldi va bir turi namuna kitob qilish uchun uni shifrlangan qachon. U nafaqat besh asrdan, balki elektron matn terish tizimiga sakrashdan ham omon qoldi va mohiyatan o'zgarishsiz qoldi. U 1960-yillarda chiqarilishi bilan ommalashgan Letraset o'z ichiga olgan choyshablar Lore Ipsum parchalar va yaqinda kabi ish stoli nashriyot dasturlari bilan Aldus PageMaker versiyalari, shu jumladan Lore Ipsum.
fields.description_en: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

fields.name: Vermikulit
fields.description:
Vermikulit
Vermikulit-qatlamli tuzilishga ega bo'lgan gidrosl√ºdlar guruhidan mineral. Ko'p hollarda ochiq usulda qazib olinadi, eng katta kon Kola yarim orolida joylashgan. Kimyoviy tarkibi doimiy emas, lekin umuman olganda ‚Äî magniy oksidi (14-23%), temir oksidi (1-3%), temir oksidi (5-17%), alyuminiy oksidi (10-13%), kremniy dioksidi (37-42%), bog'langan suv (8-18%).
fields.description_en:
Vermiculite
Vermiculite is a mineral from the group of hydrosludes having a layered structure. It is mined in most cases by an open method, the largest deposit is located on the Kola Peninsula. The chemical composition is variable, but in general it is magnesium oxide (14-23%), iron oxide (1-3%), iron oxide (5-17%), aluminum oxide (10-13%), silicon dioxide (37-42%), bound water (8-18%).

Vermiculite
Vermiculite is a mineral from the group of hydrosludes having a layered structure. It is mined in most cases by an open method, the largest deposit is located on the Kola Peninsula. The chemical composition is variable, but in general it is magnesium oxide (14-23%), iron oxide (1-3%), iron oxide (5-17%), aluminum oxide (10-13%), silicon dioxide (37-42%), bound water (8-18%).
